articles.title: One of the rarest baseball cards is up for auction — and there are local connections
articles.description:

summary: Honus Wagner baseball card auction closes on February 21, 2024.

articles.title: Bruins G Jeremy Swayman set to make Olympic debut and start for Team USA vs. Denmark
articles.description:
Swayman didn't get a start for Team USA in last year's 4 Nations Face-Off, but helped it win the IIHF World Championship later in 2025.

The post Bruins G Jeremy Swayman set to make Olympic debut and start for Team USA vs. Denmark appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bruins goalie Jeremy Swayman will start for Team USA in the Olympics against Denmark.
Swayman previously contributed to Team USA's IIHF World Championship victory in 2025.
His Olympic debut boosts Boston's representation in international hockey events.

articles.title: New England Aquarium IDs right whale found dead off Virginia
articles.description:
Scientists will conduct a necropsy to determine the cause of death, marking the second right whale fatality documented in just two weeks.

The post New England Aquarium IDs right whale found dead off Virginia appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Scientists will perform a necropsy on a right whale found dead off Virginia.
This marks the second right whale fatality in two weeks, raising concerns.
Boston residents may face increased awareness and conservation efforts for endangered species.
